CustomField.description: This button is rendered once all of the required fields have been completed to close the Job Requisition and sent it to IT to create an IT Work Ticket
CustomField.formula: IF (Ready_to_Close__c = true && ISBLANK(TEXT(IT_Status__c)) , HYPERLINK("apex/NI_JobReq_SendToIT?id=" &Id & "&action=sendToIT", IMAGE("/resource/SendToIT", "Close Req & Send to IT"), "_blank"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This button is rendered once all of the required fields have been completed to close the Job Requisition and sent it to IT to create an IT Work Ticket
CustomField.label: Close Req & Send to IT
